alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lake and north central Klamath Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 330 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 15 miles north of Crack In The Ground, or 37 miles east of La Pine, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Rock, Crack In The Ground and Silver Lake. This includes Highway 31 in Oregon between mile markers 3 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
